verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* being \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*,

\w Being|strong="G3985"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* he did \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w ended|strong="G4931"\w*, \w he|strong="G3983"\w* \w afterward|strong="G5305"\w* \w hungered|strong="G3983"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w command|strong="G2036"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w It is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w live|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w bread|strong="G0740"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w word|strong="G4487"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w taking|strong="G0321"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G0321"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w an|strong="G3735"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w kingdoms|strong="G0932"\w* of the \w world|strong="G3625"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w moment|strong="G4743"\w* of \w time|strong="G5550"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w All|strong="G0537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* will I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: for \w that|strong="G3754"\w* is \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w whomsoever|strong="G1437"\w* I \w will|strong="G2309"\w* I \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* wilt \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Get thee|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w behind|strong="G3694"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3450"\+w*, \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3441"\+w* \+w shalt thou serve|strong="G3000"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* a \w pinnacle|strong="G4419"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w* from \w hence|strong="G1782"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, He shall \w give|strong="G1781"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w charge|strong="G1781"\w* \w over|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, to \w keep|strong="G1314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* they shall \w bear|strong="G0142"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w*, lest at any \w time|strong="G3379"\w* thou \w dash|strong="G4350"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w foot|strong="G4228"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w It is said|strong="G2046"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt|strong="G1598"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tempt|strong="G1598"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G4931"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* had \w ended|strong="G4931"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w*, he \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G0891"\w* a \w season|strong="G2540"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* a \w fame|strong="G5345"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w through|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the region round \w about|strong="G4066"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, being \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* he had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* brought \w up|strong="G5142"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* custom \w was|strong="G1486"\w*, he \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* stood \w up|strong="G0450"\w* for to \w read|strong="G0314"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w delivered|strong="G1929"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w opened|strong="G0380"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, he \w found|strong="G2147"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*,

\wj  \+w The Spirit|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w of the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w he hath anointed|strong="G5548"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w to preach the gospel|strong="G2097"\+w* \+w to the poor|strong="G4434"\+w*; \+w he hath sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w to heal|strong="G2390"\+w* \+w the brokenhearted|strong="G4937"\+w*, \+w to preach|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w deliverance|strong="G0859"\+w* \+w to the captives|strong="G0164"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w recovering of sight|strong="G0309"\+w* \+w to the blind|strong="G5185"\+w*, \+w to set|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w liberty|strong="G0859"\+w* \+w them that are bruised|strong="G2352"\+w*,\wj*
\wj  \+w To preach|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w the acceptable|strong="G1184"\+w* \+w year|strong="G1763"\+w* \+w of the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w closed|strong="G4428"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w*, and he \w gave|strong="G0591"\w* \add it\add* \w again|strong="G0591"\w* to the \w minister|strong="G5257"\w*, and sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of all \w them|strong="G3956"\w* that \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* were \w fastened|strong="G0816"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w This day|strong="G4594"\+w* \+w is|strong="G4137"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w scripture|strong="G1124"\+w* \+w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w ears|strong="G3775"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w bare|strong="G3140"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3056"\w* \w gracious|strong="G5485"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w proceeded|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Joseph’s|strong="G2501"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Ye will|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w surely|strong="G3843"\+w* \+w say|strong="G2046"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w proverb|strong="G3850"\+w*, \+w Physician|strong="G2395"\+w*, \+w heal|strong="G2323"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G4572"\+w*: \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w we have heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w done|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w here|strong="G5602"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w country|strong="G3968"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w No|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w prophet|strong="G4396"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w accepted|strong="G1184"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w country|strong="G3968"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w a truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w widows|strong="G5503"\+w* \+w were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Israel|strong="G2474"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w of Elias|strong="G2243"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w the heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w was shut up|strong="G2808"\+w* \+w three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w years|strong="G2094"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w six|strong="G1803"\+w* \+w months|strong="G3376"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w great|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w famine|strong="G3042"\+w* \+w was|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w throughout|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the land|strong="G1093"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w Elias|strong="G2243"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G3992"\+w*, \+w save|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Sarepta|strong="G4558"\+w*, \+add a city\+add* \+w of Sidon|strong="G4605"\+w*, \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w a woman|strong="G1135"\+w* \+add that was\+add* \+w a widow|strong="G5503"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w lepers|strong="G3015"\+w* \+w were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Israel|strong="G2474"\+w* \+w in the time|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w of Eliseus|strong="G1666"\+w* \+w the prophet|strong="G4396"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w was cleansed|strong="G2511"\+w*, \+w saving|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w Naaman|strong="G3497"\+w* \+w the Syrian|strong="G4948"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* all \w they|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, were \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* the \w brow|strong="G3790"\w* of the \w hill|strong="G3735"\w* \w whereon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* was \w built|strong="G3618"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* they might \w cast|strong="G2630"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* down \w headlong|strong="G2630"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w passing|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* went his \w way|strong="G4198"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* came \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w days|strong="G4521"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of an \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w devil|strong="G1140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cried \w out|strong="G0349"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Let|strong="G1436"\w* \add us\add* \w alone|strong="G1436"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* have we to \w do|strong="G2254"\w* with \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \add thou\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3479"\w*? art thou \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*? I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w*; the Holy \w One|strong="G0040"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Hold thy peace|strong="G5392"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj* And \w when|strong="G2532"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1140"\w* had \w thrown|strong="G4496"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*, he \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w hurt|strong="G0984"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w amazed|strong="G2285"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spake|strong="G4814"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* a \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \add is\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*! \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* he \w commandeth|strong="G2004"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they come \w out|strong="G1831"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fame|strong="G2279"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* went \w out|strong="G1607"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* of the country round \w about|strong="G4066"\w*.
